channel.title: Die after a duel?

item.title: Die after a duel?
item.dc:creator: @PartyKing PartyKing
item.description:
@PartyKing wrote:

Ok well on my soruce when you right click>duel somone well if you lose(die) then you lose all your items that you had, what do i do to make it where you dont lose your stuff. Here is my code in player.java

[code]public boolean DuelReady = false;
public int DuelPartner = 0;
public boolean DuelCan = false;
public int DuelTimer = -1;
public int DuelX = 0;
public int DuelY = 0;

public void ResetDuel()
{
DuelReady = false;
DuelPartner = 0;
DuelCan = false;
DuelTimer = -1;
skulledDelay = -1;
}
public boolean AtDuel()
{
if(absX >= 3362 && absY >= 3228 && absX <= 3391 && absY <= 3241)
{
return true;
}
else
{
return false;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
